Package nl.uu.cs.aplib.environments

Class ConsoleEnvironment

java.lang.Object
nl.uu.cs.aplib.mainConcepts.Environment
nl.uu.cs.aplib.environments.ConsoleEnvironment
public class ConsoleEnvironment extends Environment
A simple implementation of Environment that offers methods to read from and write to the console. Of course an agent can just read or write to the console without the help of this Environment, but the purpose of this class is to provide a simple example of implementing an Environment.
Author:
wish
